content.question: One of the goals of Reaganomics was to

choices.label: encourage private investment through tax cuts for businesses and the wealthy
redistribute income to the bottom fifth of wage earners
reduce the United States nuclear arsenal
outsource United States manufacturing to Asian countries

content.answer: encourage private investment through tax cuts for businesses and the wealthy

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
